content: वत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} An affix added to nouns to show ‘possession’; धनवत् possessed of wealth; रूपवत् beautiful; so भगवत्, भास्वत् &c.; (the words so formed being adjectives). {@--2@} Added to the base of the past passive participle वत् turns it into a past active participle; इत्युक्तवंतं जनकात्मजायां <ls>R. 14. 43.</ls> {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} An affix added to nouns or adjectives to denote ‘likeness’ or ‘resemblance’ and may be translated by ‘like’, ‘as’; आत्मवत्सर्वभूतानि यः पश्यति स पंडितः.
